snippet.title: Touhou 14 東方輝針城 ～ Double Dealing Character - Lunatic 1cc (ReimuB)
snippet.description:
Just a simple first lunatic 1cc.

So Touhou 14, I'll just say holy fucking crap. The Lunatic in this game is absolutely bonkers insane. This is way, way harder than UFO Lunatic ever hoped to be. 
This is not Lunatic anymore. This is Ultra. 

However as you can see, with some good POC routing effort, you can get quite a few resources to stumble your way to a clear. 

Done with a B type because all A types crash the game on lunatic on the st4 boss's 2nd spellcard. GG ZUN.

The stage 5 boss reverses your controls on the obvious spellcards. It kinds of sucks on lunatic because it's designed in such a way that you can't really handle it with just left and right movement, forcing you to do really awkward stuff.  

The first three stages of this run are kind of a trainwreck lol.
